org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api

Interface GadgetResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JSONSerializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGadgetResource, TempGadgetResource

    public interface GadgetResource
extends JSONSerializable
    A resource referenced by a GadgetSpec that constitutes a portion of that gadget spec, e.g., HTML, CSS, or JavaScript content.
    See Also:
    ContentType} for a full enumeration of the possible types.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GadgetResource.ContentType
      An enumeration of all supported GadgetResource content types.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String RESOURCE_CONTENT 
      static String RESOURCE_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContent()
      Returns the content of this resource.
      String getContentType()
      Returns an IANA compliant string representation of the content type for the content of this resource.
      String getName() 

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api.JSONSerializable

        toJSON

    • Field Detail

      • RESOURCE_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this resource

      • getContent

        String getContent()
        Returns the content of this resource. For example, if this is content of type CSS then this will return the stylesheet.
        Returns:
        the content for this resource

      • getContentType

        String getContentType()
        Returns an IANA compliant string representation of the content type for the content of this resource.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the content type
        See Also:
        ContentType#toString()}
